title: Recommendations for Establishing ITs + Object Store/Vector Store Capabilities for Attribution & Compensation (Template)
purpose: Prototype packaging of recommendations aimed at ASCE leaders for building IT-enabled knowledge governance, attribution, and compensation.

governance.stewardship: Designated society governance bodies and committees

attribution.compensation_model_hint: Prototype: route usage logs to a compensation ledger after human review.

policy_gates.rule: Do not cite draft content as validated guidance.
